alert.note: Alert for Inland Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:23PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BERKELEY COUNTY... At 723 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Cross, or 12 miles west of Moncks Corner, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Goose Creek, Moncks Corner, Ladson, Southern Lake Moultrie, Crowfield Plantation, Old Santee Canal State Park, and Pinopolis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
